message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180 to start.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for $100.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $180 is my initial offer, I'm willing to come down to $150. I believe this product is worth the value it offers.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. $150 is still a bit too steep for my budget though. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $125?
